document.topic_text: Remodel with Bee Window Today for an Energy Efficient Home April 15, 2016 by George Faerber Thinking about having a sunroom? Fancy a porch that is more functional and comfortable? Have you been thinking about remodeling your home for a while now? It turns out that this year is a great time to start on that home remodeling project because federal tax credits for energy-efficient home improvements have been extended until December 31, 2016! Among the home improvements covered by federal tax credits are insulation, roofs, windows, doors, and skylights. The only requirement for them is that they should be ENERGY STAR-certified. Products and Services How can we help? At BEE Window®, we have been meeting Indiana’s home improvement needs for over 25 years. Our ENERGY STAR products include home doors such as Anderson steel entry doors , Infinity from Marvin® replacement windows, attic insulation, patio enclosures, and vinyl siding replacement. Apart from being a one-stop shop for home improvement products, we also make sure that our customers only get quality service from us. Our company philosophy includes teamwork, ethics, and accountability. Perfect Partner We go the extra mile to meet the needs and wants of our clients. For instance, if it’s Anderson entry doors you need for your home, we provide a range of styles and designs on this product. Our experts will take care of the installation while our support personnel will make sure that you get the care you need at every level of your home improvement project. With BEE Window as your partner and tax incentives supporting your move to build an energy-efficient home, you have every reason to take your home to the next level. You can count on us to get the job done efficiently, with nothing less than the best products and services. Give us a call at (800) 233-0169 to learn more about home improvement projects that can give you more savings and let you benefit from tax credits.
